OOC: Will Nightstrike and Darkfate be fleeing with the other Minions or
are they hanging out to take on the hovertank and the incomming
Maximals on thier own? 

Richard Allen, do you also control the shuttle or just your characters
on it? In case you wanted the shuttle to fire on the fleeing minions?

Preston


--- Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> 
> --- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
> 
> > ::Lord Elder::
> > 
> > Seeing how hurt his prey were and the damage he causes, 
> > Elder take aim and fires three more shots at Phobia. He 
> > then notices Decible's missile incoming. He turns away 
> > from the hatch, back to the wall.
> > 
> > Elder: Evasive manuvers! We're under missile lock!
> 
> Despite her damage Phobia is able to stay in the air holding aloft
> the
> dangling form of Deepstryke. Now more wary from shot from behind she
> is
> able to take more evasive action as the rapid fire shots come from
> the
> Maximal shuttle (Elder). She swung to one side and then the other as
> the cord from her swung at crazy angles almost jerking her through
> the
> air. As the last of the shots flies wide she streaks high into the
> air
> her boosters pushing at thier limits! Like some meteor or perhaps a
> comet she pushed through the skies her form seeming to almost light
> up
> as the air from the resisting atmophere heats up her armor turning it
> bright oranges, but she continues flying!
> 
> Decibel fires another volley of missiles at the Maximal shuttle
> before
> she too fires her engines and streaked into the upper atmosphere. it
> was time to leave, even though she wanted so much to stay and pummel
> the Maximal ship with missiles! 
> 
> Tummult fired a round and grazing at the ground trying to cover
> Nightstrike and Darkfate, but so far he couldn't tell if they were
> staying to fight on, or preparing to leave. He shrugged internally,
> they had heard the order to retreat, if they wanted to stay and fight
> .
> . . he sighed, "Nightstrike, Darkfate, get your rusted aftplates in
> the
> skies NOW! We are LEAVING!"
> 
> Tummult's boosters fired as he also pushed higher into the skies, not
> one to hang out when there was nothing to win.
> 
> Below them on the ground the hover tank continued to fire on the
> minions, his powerful cannon sending punishing blasts of plasma into
> the air. However as only Nightstrike and Darkfate are still in the
> vicinity they recieve his full attention!
> 
> Preston
> (Da'minion & Legacy)
> 
> 
> 
>       
>
